metadata.title: CVE-2018-16402 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-updates 18.04 LTS (bionic) - low
metadata.description:
libelf/elf_end.c in elfutils 0.173 allows remote attackers to cause adenial of service (double free and application crash) or possibly haveunspecified other impact because it tries to decompress twice.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-16402` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

elfutils - 0.170-0.4ubuntu0.1
libasm1 - 0.170-0.4ubuntu0.1
libdw1 - 0.170-0.4ubuntu0.1
libelf1 - 0.170-0.4ubuntu0.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: elfutils package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.170-0.4ubuntu0.1').
